Zype Player Matrix

The Zype platform offers powerful ways to determine which players are used to serve your video content. Below is a list that shows which players are available on which device endpoints and the format for each player. Use the Zype platform to create player rules which will serve your content accordingly.
Response Format Monetization Devices
JSON JavaScript Flash HTML5 Native AVOD SVOD EST Web Mobile iOS Roku
Crunchyroll Web
Hulu Web
Livestream Clip
Livestream Clip iOS
Livestream Event
Livestream Event iOS
Vimeo Web
Vimeo PRO (Native)
Vimeo PRO (Zype)
Vimeo PRO Roku
YouTube Web
YouTube iOS
Zype Web
Zype Roku
Zype Audio
Zype Download
Zype iOS
